entry.title: Friday: Flurries. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Flurries beginning this morning. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 this morning. High minus 6. Wind chill near minus 17. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:00 AM NDT Friday 7 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 20. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 6:00 AM NDT Friday 7 April 2023
